title: lina2018
author: lina2018
content: Exciting News for all Crypto Enthusiasts. We've got something amazing to share with you. Imagine a world where rich and famous people decide to give back to the community, just like Bill Gates or George Lucas. Well, our anonymous billionaire friend was one of them. Before his passing, he decided to share some of his wealth with the crypto community.About Our Benefactor: This special person was a big fan of blockchain and believed it could bring people closer together. He wanted to spread love and unity, and that's what this project is all about.Roadmap: Q4 2023: We're giving away $1 million to 1000 lucky members of the crypto community. Yes, you read that right! Q4 2023: We're also creating special digital collectibles called NFTs. You can even help make them! These NFTs will represent our unity. Q1 2024: We're hosting contests for blockchain enthusiasts and Web3 programmers. To participate, you just need one of our special NFTs as your pass. Winners of these contests will get cool prizes! If you're a winner with a blockchain project or startup idea, you can pitch it to us. We'll pick two projects to fund, and you won't need to give up any ownership shares.Why You Should Join: Getting involved means being part of a bigger mission. We're all about kindness, sharing, and making the world a better place. How to Join: To be part of this amazing project, just fill out this form- https://omniform1.com/forms/v1/landingPage/64b5b74a7947c2badc337480/64b723794bfc9bb04d76fbc5It's that simple!Keep an eye out for what's coming in 2024. We've got exciting stuff planned! The crypto world is powerful, and together, we can use it to do great things. let's make the world a better place with crypto!Disclaimer: I want to make it clear that I am not personally associated with this initiative as I am the forum presenter for it. Please do your homework before investing or making any decisions.

comments.author: King0
comments.body: Can you provide more details about the criteria for selecting the 1000 lucky winners of the $1 million giveaway in Q4 2023?

comments.author: lemi1
comments.body: Are there any plans to involve the wider crypto community in decision-making processes or project development in the future?

comments.author: ahadudzaman
comments.body: Can you share more about the team or individuals managing and overseeing the project's execution and operations?

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Since the op is not part of the project team, I would like to ask him why he chose to publish this vision, on the basis of which they launch their services:- What benefit does the subject expect from providing such a service?- Who might need this service? That is, what might prompt someone to create their own token?- I would be really surprised if I learned that the owner of the show found clients in exchange for his service.I often encounter advertisements for these projects that I do not find a reputation for on the Internet. I often wonder who launches it and what they gain from it.
